title: Section Registration
subtitle: Mark all times you are available - we'll assign you optimal sections

form.name: Full Name
form.classLabel: Class Availability (check all times you can attend)
form.recitationLabel: Recitation Availability (check all times you can attend)
form.taLabel: TA Section Availability (check all times you can attend)

messages.success: Sections assigned based on your availability:
messages.validationClass: Please select at least one class time
messages.validationRecA: Please select at least one Wednesday recitation

messages.noFeasible: No sections available that match your availability. Please expand your availability or contact course staff.
